WebhostUK LTD: One of the leading SSD Cloud VPS Hosting provider in UK brings you an exciting offer on its VPS Servers, Sign up for any of our Cloud VPS Server and get First Month absolutely FREE! Yes you read it right, starting August 3rd, we are offering First Month VPS hosting absolutely Free.

With all our VPS plans, customers gain FULL root access to their VPS server. All VPS nodes are DELL branded Quad core servers with RAID ARRAY Drives, thus offering the best CPU and Memory resources with data protection for every VPS hosted with us.

WebhostUK VPS Hosting plans are fully managed servers including server setups, OS optimization, security tweaks and 24/7 server monitoring with reboots. Our skilled technicians are available round the clock over live chat to provide you instant technical support.

Below is the list of extensive features including free takeaways available with VPS Hosting:

1) Full Root Access (SSH Enabled)
2) High-end servers with 16-32GB RAM
3) Fully Managed VPS
4) 24/7/365 days instant support available via Live Chat and Ticket System.
5) 24x7 Monitored VPS
6) Not oversold servers.
7) Free Backup (Daily and weekly backups)
8) Free Control panel (WHM/cPanel)
9) Free Dedicated IPs
10) Softaculous Integrated (Includes 290 plus scripts Auto installer)
11) 99.9% Uptime Guarantee SLA
12) Free Setup
13) Free Migration (Just fill the migration request form, rest our expert migration team will take care)

Take a look at our VPS Hosting Plans on the following link:

VPS Hosting
Windows VPS Hosting

How Does the VPS First Month Free Offer Work?

1) Signup for monthly billing cycle, make the payment and we will add the amount as Credit to your account so it will be applied automatically to your second month’s invoice. So, you get first month for free. This is done to avoid fraudulent orders and spammers.

2) While placing order, use "FREEVPS" Coupon Code and our billing department will add the first month payment as credit to your account to be applied for the second month’s invoice.

Below Terms & Conditions govern this Offer:

1) First month payment is taken to avoid fraudulent orders and spammers.
2) First month payment is added credit to your account which will be applied to the second month’s invoice automatically.
3) The Credit amount is non-refundable.
4) This offer is applicable for new customers and first VPS order only.

To check and order our VPS Hosting plans, please refer following link:

VPS Hosting
Windows VPS Hosting

First Month Free Coupon Code: FREEVPS

Offer is valid till August 26 , 2016. So Hurry Up and grab this deal! If you have any queries regarding the offer, please do not hesitate to contact us or reply to this thread.
